Reviews.Title: Great entry level
Reviews.Author: Wayne L Backes
Reviews.Content: I used to have a 35mm slr camera many years ago when the kids were little.  I took many great pictures of them (some not so great) until one child played a little too much with it.  I never replaced it and only used a point and shoot until I bought the T4i.  Now I don't have to worry about those not so great pictures as I can just delete them.  I'm having a great time remembering things from 20 years ago and learning new features now.  Definitely worth the money.  Love the touch screen.  If you can't afford this camera, just save your money until you can.
